## validateVendor() function

Validates the vendor part of a schema string is valid for a rule set

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function validateVendor(input: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | Vendor part of a schema string |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Whether the vendor validation string is valid
